alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:06PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sedgwick County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1006 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Goddard, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Haysville, Park City, Valley Center, Goddard, Maize, Colwich, Garden Plain, Mount Hope, Downtown Wichita, Andale, Bentley, West Wichita, Eisenhower National Airport and Lake Afton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 2. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 36 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
